sentence.Network_en: Almost 80 percent of the state's residents were born elsewhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 该州居民中几乎有80%出生在异地。

sentence.Network_en: External broadcasting soaks up more resources in Britain than elsewhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国花费在对外广播上的财力高于其他国家。

sentence.Network_en: Businesses are feeling the indirect effects from the recession that'sgoing on elsewhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 企业感受到了别处经济衰退带来的间接影响。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English elles hwær (see else, where)

entry.def: Elsewhere means in other places or to another place.

example.ex: Almost 80 percent of the state's residents were born elsewhere...
example.tran: 该州居民中几乎有80%出生在异地。

example.ex: They were living rather well, in comparison with people elsewhere in the world...
example.tran: 和世界上其他地方的人相比，他们生活得相当好。

auth_sentence.content: Elsewhere, a more machine-driven approach pays off dividends.
auth_sentence.res_content: Elsewhere, a more machine-driven approach pays off dividends.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Elsewhere, a more machine-driven approach pays off dividends.

auth_sentence.content: I have outlined this proposal in more detail elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have outlined this proposal in more detail elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have outlined this proposal in more detail elsewhere.

auth_sentence.content: There are signs of hope elsewhere in the team.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are signs of hope elsewhere in the team.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are signs of hope elsewhere in the team.

Sentence.sentence: But there are reasons that we buy all that old from elsewhere.
their technology has fallen behind their competitors' elsewhere in the world
But having made a successful purchase from, say, Amazon, they felt safe buying elsewhere.

sentences.en: Our favourite restaurant was full so we had to go elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 我们最喜欢去的那家饭店客满了, 因此不得不改去别处。

jushi.english: Can you find anything like this elsewhere?
jushi.chinese: 你能在别处找到这样的东西吗?

jushi.english: The hotel was flul so we had to go elsewhere.
jushi.chinese: 这家旅馆客满了,因此我们不得不改去别处。
